page.title: 14ASTON ON TRENT SCHOOL
page.content: AT EASTER 1984 WE MOVED TO A NEW SCHOOL BUILDING.OUR OLD SCHOOL WAS USED FOR 139 YRS AND OUR NEW ONE IS VERY MODERN WITH A PROPERLY EQUIPPED HALL, WHICH CAN BE USED FOR DINING, AS A GYMNASIUM AND FOR ASEMBLIES.WE ALSO HAVE CHANGING ROOMS,A LIBARY AND A COUTYARD.THE CLOAKROOMS ARE SMALL AND CRAMPED.THERE ARE SIX CLASSES IN THE SCHOOL WITH 168 CHILDREN.AFTER-SCHOOL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE CHOIR, FOOTBALL, NATURE, GYMNASTICS, COUNTRY DANCING, SPORTS, CROSS-COUNTRY, NETBALL, RECORDERS AND CYCLING PROFICIENCY.AT CHRISTMAS WE HAD A WHITE AND TINSEL PARTY FOR OUR CLASS.WE ALSO HAD A CAROL SERVICE AT ALL SAINTS CHURCH AND WENT CAROL SINGING AROUND OUR VILLAGE.IN SUMMER WE HAD A GALA DAY AND RAISED NEARLY Â£800.
